## Private Member Functions

### Initialize() {#a36edb1ffdc54ce6fc923afdf35abd063}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void AArch64&#95;ELFTargetObjectFile::Initialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp; ctx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

Initialize - this method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

This specifies the current context for codegen, and gives the lowering implementations a chance to set up their default sections.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64targetobjectfile-h/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64targetobjectfile-h">AArch64TargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64targetobjectfile-cpp/#l00024">24</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64targetobjectfile-cpp">AArch64TargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.
